text.part1:
Good day Mr Krists, 
 I hope you are doing well.
text.part2: I am writing to thank you for your opportunity to join your team.
text.part3: As we had the previous meeting, I had no idea what Spring boot was or how it worked, but I was able to install it on my local machine and run it on my local machine.
text.part4: I also didn't know about the in-memory database as the H2, but I was able to get it to work. As I usually use the MySql or MangoDB, or just use a Global variable to store any volatile data.
text.part5: This was a project that really took me out of my confort zone and experiment with a new Framework. It was not very fun, to be honest, but very rewarding in a personal developping way.
